        public float getValue​(Node nodeToEvaluate)

      • getValueString

        public java.lang.String getValueString​(Node nodeToEvaluate)
        Description copied from interface: IEvaluationFunction
        Get a formatted string of the evaluated value of a node. Typically this will divide the value up into whatever components go into it, making it easier to interpret and debug.
        Specified by:
        getValueString in interface IEvaluationFunction
        Parameters:
        nodeToEvaluate - Node to determine the value of.
        Returns:
